verbs.description: [ARG0: he] [V: thought] [ARG1: he was going to film a basking shark instead a great white appeared before him] keith ellenbogen thought he was going to film a basking shark in the stellwagen bank national marine sanctuary instead a great white shark was swimming toward him read more on boston com sharks band formed 2007 keith ellenbogen
